programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, a Mexican joint in Grand Central Market serves outrageous octopus tostadas and their spin on a burger; in Norfolk, a bistro turns out grown-up, gourmet grilled cheese; a righteous stop in Lansing does it up right.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In South Beach, Fla., a taqueria serving up scratch-made tortillas and grasshopper tacos, an authentic German joint cooking up sauerbraten and currywurst, and a poolside oasis dishing out paella and homemade linguine.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In San Francisco, a totally gluten-free menu of Venezuelan standbys like arepas and empanadas; in Portland, homemade meats like Italian red wine dry cured salami and roasted garlic and rosemary bologna.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Grub infused with international flavors; a spot in Wilmington, Del., puts Thai into sausage and Cuban into sandwiches; in Kauai, there's a Tiki joint cooking up Hawaiian flair; a Lebanese place in San Diego is serving authentic specialties.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Hawaii, a poke place knocks it out of the park with their island specialties; a crazy Italian spot in San Carlos, Calif., puts tasty twists on their homemade pasta; a Latin joint in Miami serves up killer Colombian specialties.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's digs into flavors spanning the Americas; in Charlotte, N.C., a brewery serves the bomb bacon jam burger and a duck confit flatbread; in Cancun, Mexico, a spot serves street tacos; in Houston, a joint cooks up Argentinian empanadas.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri and his son, Hunter, are taking a culinary journey up to Juneau, Alaska, and they dive into everything from a family-run, wood-fired pizza wagon making reindeer pie to a funky basement spot mashing up Latin-Asian fusion.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: A Los Angeles spot dishes out El Salvadorian with a twist, while an Oregon food cart serves up authentic Indian.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Laramie, Wyo., an old-school cafe has green chili burritos and pie; a spot in Anchorage, Alaska has blackened chicken gnocchi.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri hits up joints owned by Food Network super chefs; Maneet Chauhan serves up her creative spin on Indian recipes in Nashville, Tenn.; Michael Symon fires up pork belly at his barbecue spot in Cleveland.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's hittin' up joints crushin' all kinds of flavor; there's a Malaysian oasis in Cincinnati and a Salvadorian spot in Port Chester, N.Y., each serving their real deal cultural specialties; a bus in Omaha goes Detroit-style with their pizza.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.sub-title: Sandwiches, Southern and South of the Border
programme.desc: Guy Fieri dives into sandwiches, Southern eats and south-of-the-border specialties; in Spokane, Wash., a lights-out food truck smoking up real-deal barbecue; in Ashland, Ore., a Mexican joint putting a tasty twist on tamales.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits restaurants with diverse cuisines; he tries Balinese chicken thighs at a Southeast Asian restaurant in Minneapolis and BBQ Reubens at a New Jersey; a couple prepares plant-based dishes in Montana.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's grabbing a little surf, turf, and flavors from the Earth; in Puerto Rico, a local gem is serving off-the-hook pork trifongo and shrimp empanadas; Guy finds a mushroom po' boy in Somerville, N.J., and outrageous octopus in Cleveland.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Long Beach, Calif., pot roast and scones; in Jackson, Wyo., pies topped with everything from pesto to spicy sausage and marinara; in Monterey, Calif., parmesan pretzels and short rib grilled cheese.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is getting into the funkiest of flavors; in Atlanta, two pals are serving up prime-time patty melt empanadas and a bakery in Los Angeles is plating craveable khachapuri.
